title: Too Many Green Iguanas in Taiwan

content.en: There's a small dinosaur in that tree! Oh, wait. It's a green iguana! Some people keep them as pets.
content.tw: 天啊！樹上那個是一隻小恐龍嗎？啊，原來是綠鬣蜥，有一些人會飼養這種蜥蜴當寵物。

content.en: But iguanas are hard to care for. So some people don't want them anymore. They let their iguanas go free.
content.tw: 但是綠鬣蜥很難照顧，所以有一些人不想養，把牠們隨便棄養。

content.en: Then these iguanas have lots of babies. An iguana can have 20 to 70 babies in one year!
content.tw: 問題是這些綠鬣蜥繁殖很快，一隻綠鬣蜥一年可以生 20 到 70 個寶寶！

content.en: Now Taiwan has too many green iguanas. There are about 200,000! Many are in the south and center of Taiwan. They eat lots of plants on farms. That's very bad for farmers!
content.tw: 現在台灣有大約 20 萬隻綠鬣蜥，太多了！牠們大部分在台灣中部跟南部，會把農作物吃掉，讓農夫很頭痛！

content.en: Taiwan is helping these farmers. It is spending 20 million Taiwan dollars this year. It wants hunters to catch 120,000 iguanas this year!
content.tw: 政府今年花了 2 千萬幫助農夫，預計要抓 12 萬隻綠鬣蜥。

content.en: Taiwan is paying the hunters to catch iguanas. For one small iguana, hunters get 200 Taiwan dollars. For one large iguana, hunters get 500 Taiwan dollars. (SFX: jackpot)
content.tw: 他們的方式是獎勵抓綠鬣蜥的人。如果抓到一隻小綠鬣蜥，可以拿到兩百元，如果抓到大的就可以賺到五百元。

content.en: Green iguanas are hard to have as pets. They need lots of care. But if you have a green iguana, DON'T let it go free! That's bad for Taiwan!
content.tw: 綠鬣蜥很難當寵物養。牠們需要很多照顧。但是如果你有綠鬣蜥，不要隨意棄養牠們！這對台灣很不好！

vocabulary.preface: 外來種的綠鬣蜥喜歡吃農作物，讓農夫很頭痛。

content.text: 1. farm 農場. Wow, you have lots of pets on your farm! 哇，你的農場上有好多寵物! They are not pets. 牠們不是寵物. We raise the chickens for eggs. 我們養這些雞是為了雞蛋.
2. care for 照顧. And this is not my farm. 而且這也不是我的農場. It's my grandpa's. 是我阿公的. He cares for them every day. 他每天照顧牠們. It's hard work.很辛苦呢.
3. need 需要. Can I keep a baby chick? 我可以養一隻小雞嗎? As a pet? 當作寵物嗎? It needs a lot of care. 牠需要很多照顧. Are you ready for that? 你準備那樣做?
4. keep 飼養. I believe I am.我相信我可以. I've kept a duckling before.我以前養過小鴨子. It grew very well. 牠長得很好.

vocabulary.postscript: 你有看過真正的小雞小鴨嗎? farm農場 care for照顧 need需要 keep飼養

2. How many green iguanas does Taiwan want hunters to catch?
3. How many Taiwan dollars do hunters get for a small iguana?

title: One-Hundred-Year-Old Man Helps Kids Every Day

content.en: At 7 a.m., kids are walking to school. Many cars and scooters are on the streets. They are going fast!
content.tw: 每天早上七點，很多小學生走路去上學，他們要穿越馬路，但馬路上的汽機車都趕著去上班，所以開得非常快!

content.en: Kids, you have to be very careful at crosswalks. Look both ways before you cross the street. Are cars coming on your right side? Are cars coming on your left side?
content.tw: 大家過斑馬線的時候都要非常小心哦! 要確定左右兩邊都沒有車子開過來，才可以穿越。

content.en: In Hsinchu, Grandpa Lo stands at a crosswalk. He's there every school day. He helps elementary school kids cross the street. He wears a yellow vest. Everyone can see him! He holds a yellow "stop" flag. He gives high fives to kids!
content.tw: 在新竹，有一位羅爺爺每天在小學旁邊的馬路，帶領小朋友過馬路，他穿著黃色背心還舉著黃色旗子，非常醒目。

content.en: Guess what? Grandpa Lo is 100 years old! What's his secret to living for so long? Well, it's the smiles on kids' faces. Their smiles make him happy. That's why he helps kids cross the road. He's been helping them for 20 years!
content.tw: 羅爺爺已經高齡一百歲了，當交通導護也有二十年了。他說長壽的祕密，就是小朋友們開心的笑容。

content.en: When there's heavy rain, Grandpa Lo is there. When it's very hot, Grandpa Lo is there. The weather can't stop him!
content.tw: 不管是下大雨，或是出大太陽，羅爺爺都會在馬路守護小朋友，他是個英雄!

content.en: Do you want to be strong like Grandpa Lo? He's helping kids at 100 years old!
content.tw: 你想像羅爺爺一樣強壯嗎？他一百歲了還在幫助孩子們！

vocabulary.preface: 百歲老公公每天當志工，讓小學生安全過馬路。

content.text:
1. cross 越過。
Every day, I see people cross the street here like they have nine lives.
我每天都看到人們在這裡過馬路，好像有九條命似的。
They don't wait, just go. 他們都不等，只管走。

2. careful 小心的。
I think it's okay.我想還好吧。
There are so few cars here.這裡車子很少。
Still, you need to be careful. 還是要小心。

3. right 右邊，left 左邊。
I'm always careful. 我總是很小心。
You are? 是嗎?
Yeah, I look to the right and left before I move. 是啊，我走之前會左看右看。

4. crosswalk 行人穿越道。
Then why didn't you cross at the crosswalk? 那妳為什麼沒走行人穿越道?
Oh well… I was in a hurry. 這個嘛，我在趕時間。

vocabulary.postscript:
今天你學到哪些單字?
cross越過 careful小心的 right, left右邊左邊 crosswalk人行道

quiz.question: 3. How long has Grandpa Lo been helping kids cross the street?

title: The Candy That Made a Town Famous

content.en: Long ago, a woman lived in a small town in Sweden. She needed money to help her family. So she made and sold candy!
content.tw: 很久以前，一位住在瑞典小鎮的女士需要賺錢養家，所以她開始製作糖果。

content.en: The woman worked very hard. She boiled lots of sugar and water. She put in a little vinegar and peppermint oil.
content.tw: 她非常努力地工作，她先把糖跟水煮沸，再加入一點醋和薄荷油，就變成糖果!

content.en: The woman pulled and folded and pulled and folded the soft warm candy. She put a nice red stripe in it. Then she rolled and rolled it.
content.tw: 然後，她把原本軟軟的糖果拉長，加入漂亮的紅色條紋，然後把它們捲成一條條糖果。

content.en: The candy became hard. She cut it into small red and white candies. She made long red and white candy sticks too.
content.tw: 之後糖果會變硬，她把紅色白色相間的糖果剪成小小的塊狀，或是做成長條狀的造型。

content.en: The woman didn't tell anyone how to make the candy. But her daughter did. Now fourteen candymakers in the town can make it. It cannot be made in other places.
content.tw: 這名女士沒有告訴任何人她的祕方，但是她女兒卻透漏給別人，現在除了小鎮裡的十四個糖果師之外，全世界都沒有地方會做。

content.en: The candy made the town famous! Many people visit. They watch the candymakers make the candy. They taste it. Yum! There are lots of colors and flavors now. But people love the red and white peppermint candy the most.
content.tw: 這個糖果讓小鎮變有名，很多人專程前來品嚐，而且參觀糖果的製作過程。雖然現在出了很多新口味跟顏色，但大家最喜歡經典的紅白薄荷口味。

content.en: Many people think this candy is a Christmas candy, but people eat it all year!
content.tw: 很多人認為這種糖果是聖誕糖果，但人們一年四季都吃！

vocabulary.preface: 一位很會製造糖果的女士，讓她的小鎮聲名大噪。

content.text:
1) candy 糖果.
I'm so tired. 我好累.
I need some candy. 需要吃一點糖。
I have dark chocolate. 我有黑巧克力。
Thank you, but I'd like some real candy. 謝謝，不過我想要真的糖果。

2) red, white 紅的，白的.
How about a Christmas candy cane? 來一點耶誕節拐杖糖如何?
The red and white one? 那種紅白的糖嗎？
I love that kind of candy! 我很喜歡那種糖果!

3) daughter 女兒.
It reminds me of festivals. 它讓我想到節慶。
Yeah, it's my daughter's favorite too. 對，它也是我女兒的最愛。

4) taste 品嚐.
Mmmm, this tastes really good! 這真好吃!
It's too sweet for my taste. 對我來說太甜了。

vocabulary.postscript:
你愛吃糖嗎?來一 起讀單字。
candy糖果 red, white紅的，白的 daughter女兒 taste品嚐

quiz.question: 2. Why did the woman sell candy?
3. How many candymakers can make this candy now?

title: Luke Littler is Big in Darts

content.en: Darts are small, sharp arrows. Darts players throw them at a dartboard. They take turns throwing three darts.
content.tw: 飛鏢是一種小小、尖尖的箭頭，玩家把飛鏢扔向標靶，每個人輪流扔三次。

content.en: A dartboard has many areas. Some have a high score. Some have a low score. The players stand far from the dartboard. They try to hit the high-score areas. The areas are small! Winning is hard!
content.tw: 板子上有許多區塊，每一區有不同的分數，比賽時飛鏢選手站得遠遠的丟飛鏢，他們努力瞄準高分區，但那些區塊很小，很難射中！

content.en: Luke Littler is a teenager from England. He's a world champion! Luke is a darts player.
content.tw: Luke Littler 是來自英國的青少年，他 是個飛鏢選手，才十七歲就成了世界冠軍！

content.en: But Luke has played darts since he was 18 months old. His dad gave him a dartboard for kids. Luke was wearing a diaper when he threw his first dart!
content.tw: 他十八個月大的時候，爸爸送給他一套飛鏢玩具，他第一次玩，還包著尿布！

content.en: Last year, Luke played in the world darts championship. He went to the final game! He was 16 years old! Luke didn't win. But he became famous!
content.tw: 去年，Luke 進入世界冠軍決賽，他當時十六歲！最後他雖然沒有贏，但一舉成名。

content.en: This year, Luke won the world championship! He's the youngest world darts champion on record!
content.tw: 今年他得到了第一名，是有史以來最年輕的世界冠軍！

content.en: Luke made playing darts cool. Kids everywhere are playing darts now. There are many more darts schools too!
content.tw: 讓飛鏢變成很酷的運動，現在很多小孩都在玩飛鏢，專門教飛鏢的學校也開始流行！

content.en: Which kid will become the next world darts champion?
content.tw: 哪個孩子會成為下一位世界飛鏢冠軍？

vocabulary.preface: 擲飛鏢是一種遊戲，這名年輕人玩著玩著，成了世界冠軍。

content.text:
1. throw 扔。
Alright, Paz, watch and learn. 好，你看喔，學著點。
I'm going to throw this dart like a true champion!
我像個真正的冠軍要扔飛鏢了!
You missed it by a mile! 差了十萬八千里!

2. champion 冠軍。
Now let me show you how a champion should do. 現在讓你看看冠軍該怎麼做。
Wow, that's really something! 哇，真不錯呢!

3. record 紀錄。
You missed again ! 你又射偏了!
I know. I'm trying to break my record of losing here.
我知道。我是想打破失敗的紀錄。

4. win 贏得。
Okay, my turn now. 好，該我了。
Yeah, I win, I win! 我贏了，我贏了。
Wait, you didn't win. 等等，你沒有贏。
We have three more rounds to go.我們還要再比三回合。

vocabulary.postscript:
你有扔過飛鏢嗎?
throw扔 champion冠軍 record紀錄 win贏得

content.en: Scientists found a cemetery in England. It was two thousand years old! A group of people had used it for three hundred years. The scientists studied their DNA.
content.tw: 科學家在英國發現一座兩千年前的墓園，並且曾經有一群人使用這座墓園長達三百年！

content.en: The DNA showed many people were from one family. There were grandparents, parents, daughters, sons, aunts, uncles, cousins, and more!
content.tw: 科學家檢驗這些人的DNA，了解大部分的人都是來自同一個家族，有祖父母、父母、子女、表兄弟姐妹等等。

content.en: But there was a surprise! The people were not from their father's family. They were from their mother's family! It was the first time scientists found this kind of group.
content.tw: 更特別的是，這些親戚是來自媽媽那邊，這是科學家第一次發現這樣的族群。

content.en: The scientists think women were important to the group. Women made the group strong. They married men from other groups. But they did not go to the other groups. The husbands came to live with them.
content.tw: 科學家認為，女性在這個群體裡很重要，她們跟別的部落男子結婚，但是她們不會到別的部落去，反而是丈夫來到妻子家裡，跟她的家人一起生活。

content.en: The women in the group were farmers. The scientists think they gave their land and other things to their daughters. The women were good fighters too. Maybe they helped keep their group safe!
content.tw: 在這個族群裡，婦女還要負責種田，並且由女兒繼承財產。這些婦女也許還會保護家族安全！

content.en: Tomorrow, March 8th, is International Women's Day. Like those women long ago, many women today make their families strong and safe. Let's say "thank you" to women everywhere!
content.tw: 明天，3月8日，是國際婦女節。就像很久以前的那些女性一樣，許多今天的女性也讓她們的家庭強大而安全。讓我們向各地的女性說聲「謝謝」！

vocabulary.preface: 這座古老的墓園，證明兩千年前的英國曾經有母系社會。

content.text:
1. parents 爸爸媽媽.
What did your parents want you to be? 你爸媽想要你做什麼?
Oh, they wanted me to be a scientist. 他們想要我當科學家。
But they have long given up that idea.不過他們早就放棄了那個想法。

2. uncle 伯伯或是叔叔.
Because of your schoolwork? 是因為你的學校功課嗎?
No, because they saw my uncle's success. 不是，是因為他們看到我叔叔的成功。

3. family 家庭.
He's a video game designer. 他設計電玩。
So cool! 好酷!
What about your family? 你家如何呢?

4. father 父親.
My father wants me to study something "safe." 我爸要我讀「安全」的學科。
Safe as in boring? 安全意思是無聊嗎?
Yeah, like banking.對啊，比如說銀行學。
Counting money is not boring! 數錢不無聊啊!

vocabulary.postscript: 今天的單字都跟親人有關。 parents爸爸媽媽 uncle伯伯或是叔叔 family家庭 father父親

quiz.question: 1. Whose DNA did the scientists study?
2. What happened when a woman in the group married?
options: a. She did not go to another group.
b. She went to another group.
